Title: Suspends eviction proceedings statewide until after September 20, 2020; stays the execution of warrants of eviction or judgments of possession until after September 20, 2020
Summary: Suspends proceedings to recover real property statewide until after January 20, 2021; stays the execution of warrants of eviction or judgments of possession until after January 20, 2021.
ActClause: AN ACT to mitigate the continuing threat to public health arising from COVID-19 by ensuring that New Yorkers are not rendered homeless, evicted, or dispossessed of their housing
